gurmukhi: qb sB Bry qyj qnu rwjw ] bwjn lgy AnMqn bwjw ]
transliteration: Tab Sabh Bhare Tej Tan(u) Raajaa|| Baajan Lage Anantan Baajaa||
translation: Then all the kings, becoming alert, were highly activated and the musical instruments resounded from all the sides.

gurmukhi: mcXo bhuir Goir sMgRwmw ] jm ko Brw iCnk mih Dwmw ]28]
transliteration: Machyo Bahur(i) Ghor(i) Sanraamaa|| Jam Ko Bharaa Chhinak Maih Dhaamaa||28||
translation: Then the war become more intense and the house of Yama began to be filled with the dead.28.

gurmukhi: BUpq iPry ju`D ky kwrn ] lY lY bwx pwx hiQXwrn ]
transliteration: Bhoopat Phire Juddh Ke Kaaran|| Lai Lai Baan Hathiyaaran||
translation: The kings returned with several kinds of arrows and weapons for waging the war.

gurmukhi: Dwie Dwie Ar krq pHwrw ] jn kr cot prq GrIXwrw ]29]
transliteration: Dhaae Dhaae Ar Karat Prahaaraa|| Jan Kar Chot Parat Gdareeyaaraa||29||
translation: They began to strike blows speedily like the strokes on the gong.29.

gurmukhi: KMf KMf rx igry AKMfw ] kwNpXo KMf nvy bHmMfw ]
transliteration: Khanndkhanndran Gire Akhanndaa|| Kaanpyo Khanndnave Brahmandaa||
translation: The mighty warriors began to fall as bits and the nine regions of the world trembled.

gurmukhi: Cwif Cwif As igry nrysw ] m`icXo ju`Du suXMbr jYsw ]30]
transliteration: Chhaad(i) Chhaad(i) As Gire Daresaa|| Machchiyo Juddh(u) Suyanbar Jaisaa||30||
translation: Forsaking their swords, the kings began to fall down and there was dreadful scene in the battlefield.30.
The warriors riding on the horses, coming down, began to roam, holding their weapons;
The arrows were discharged and the bows crackled.31.
The sword began to fall and the dust rose from the earth upwards.

gurmukhi: cVy bwn swxI ] rty eyk pwxI ]32]
transliteration: Chade Baan Saanee|| Rate Ek Paanee||32||
translation: On one side, the sharp arrows are being discharged and on the other side people are repeating request for water.32.
The vultures are swooping down and the warriors equal in strength are fighting.
Durga is laughing and the glittering swords are being struck.33.
